name: Taikodom
summary: Humanity is awakened in the year 2234, inhabited by a new space civilization. Taikodom is a Massive Multiplayer Online where players explore the farthest reaches of space by boarding starships, collecting raw materials, manufacturing crafts, and equipment. The universe is at war, it is your duty to save the universe from economic domination from fighting corporations and warring factions. The MMO Taikodom, launched in 2008, is no longer available as of May 2015.
